member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketProtocol
member.summary: The WebSocket class allows applications to send and receive data after the WebSocket upgrade has completed.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketProtocol.CreateFromStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates a new WebSocket connection that operates on the specified stream.
member.param: to indicate it's the server-side of the connection; if it's the client-side.
The agreed upon sub-protocol that was used when creating the connection.
The keep-alive interval to use, or to disable keep-alives.
